SPU class

Member Function Documentation

static ctk_uint64_t ctk::Spu::getGroupId (  )  [inline, static]

Returns the group ID.

Note:
Spu::init must be called before calling this method.
Returns:
- valid group ID if the SPE program is instantiated as a member of a SPE thread group, -1 otherwise.

static ctk_uint32_t ctk::Spu::getRank (  )  [inline, static]

Returns the rank ID of the SPE program.

Note:
Spu::init must be called before calling this method.
Returns:
- rank ID of the SPE program if it is instantiated as a member of a SPE thread group, -1 otherwise.

static void ctk::Spu::init ( unsigned long long &  argv,
unsigned long long &  envp 
) [inline, static]

Initializes the CTK SPU environment. SPE programs should call this earlier than any other environment-dependent operations.

Parameters:
[in] argp - the 2nd parameter of the main function
[in] envp - the 3rd parameter of the main function

static void ctk::Spu::sleep ( unsigned long  sec  )  [inline, static]

Sleeps (spin-lock-waits) for the given seconds.

Parameters:
[in] sec - sleep period
Note:
This reads/writes decrementer.

static void ctk::Spu::usleep ( unsigned long  sec  )  [inline, static]

Sleeps (spin-lock-waits) for the given microseconds.

Parameters:
[in] usec - sleep period (in usec)
Note:
This reads/writes decrementer.
